titleStmt.title: A most rare & true report, of such great tempests, straunge sightes, and wonderfull accidents, which happened by the prouidence of God, in Hereford shire, at a place called the Hay, and there abouts, besides the sightes of strannge [sic] fowles, which there were seene, most fearefull to beholde, with their horrible cryes & strangeness, with the great hurt was done by them..
titleStmt.author: Law, Thomas, fl. 1585-1589?, pub.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
